long_description: Ready to navigate city streets on your commute or your errands, the Cannondale Felicity women's bike has built-in fenders, a rear rack and a low-maintenance, internally geared hub for easy shifting. With style inspired by classic Dutch bikes, the 6061 step-through aluminum frame is designed for maximum convenience when mounting and dismounting the bike. SRAM iMotion 3-speed internal gears are low maintenance compared to conventional cassette systems, and are simple to shift. Tektro mechanical disc brakes make quick work of reducing speed, even in the rain. Fast and stable Kenda Bitumen tires offer smooth-rolling performance. Rear rack includes an integrated bungee to hold down bulky items, and handlebar includes a bell to signal passing. Specs on the Cannondale Felicity women's bike are subject to change.
short_description: Ready to navigate city streets on your commute or your errands, the Cannondale Felicity women's bike has built-in fenders, a rear rack and a low-maintenance, internally geared hub for easy shifting.
